DOC.brief_summary: The trial aim investigate orthodontic treatment new removable-part-time-wearing appliance , base `` High-Tech '' technology . The appliance wear 12-14 hour day , make single silicone aligner , make specifically patient , use 3-D screen technology patient 's malocclusion . The aligner design pathway `` built-in '' tooth move , original position malocclusion `` end point '' - correct position . The force system , need order generate tooth movement , produce tiny air-balloons incorporated aligner . The study hypothesis , orthodontic treatment do successfully part-time wear appliance .
DOC.brief_title: Orthodontic Treatment With Part-Time Wearing Esthetic Removable Appliance
DOC.detailed_description: The appliance include : - silicone aligner ( make specifically patient . - simple air pump blow air tiny balloon . The patient guide wear appliance 12-14 hour day , fill air balloon , doctor 's instruction . Clinical examination follow-up do every 4 week .
